analytic.title: A Concordance to Addai Scher’s Catalogues of Chaldean Collections of Manuscripts in Diyarbakır and Mardin and the Holdings of the Joint Collection in Mardin Digitized by HMML in Collaboration with CNMO

biblStruct.note: The present concordance aims to provide a convenient tool for those interested in the manuscript(s) formerly kept in the two Chaldean collections of Diyarbakır and Mardin, both catalogued at the beginning of the 20th century by Addai Scher. This concordance references the digital copies produced by the Hill Museum & Manuscript Library in collaboration with the Centre Numérique des Manuscrits Orientaux and includes the class-marks assigned by W. Macomber. It also indicates the availability of microfilm copies held in the archive of A. Vööbus and in the Peshitta Institute.
